item.title: PuTTY
item.author: contact@softorage.com (Sanmay Joshi and Softorage contributors)
item.description: PuTTY is a free and open-source terminal emulator, serial console and network file transfer application. It is an implementation of SSH and Telnet for Windows and Unix platforms, along with an xterm terminal emulator. Documentation I Mailing lists I FAQ
